Html:
Hello,

I am new in this area of development. 

I am writing an application to read all Email body on Windows Mobile 6.

So I realize that the most email on windows mobile are in Mime Format.

I will like to know if with this application it possible to parse WM6 MIME format to get  the email Body?

Thanks you for your Help.

Hi feukam

That is the exact purpose of this library. I have no idea though if
the library would work out of the box on a windows mobile, but maybe
you could report back how that is working.

Snorre
